data: {"concept_id": "preposition", "concept_name": "Preposition", "set": "Grammar & Punctuation", "type": "element", "definition": "Relationship hinge word marking space, time, cause, purpose, means, association, opposition, or comparison.", "axes": "relation|specificity|idiomaticity|register", "axis_values": "space|time|cause_source|purpose_benefit|means_instrument|association|opposition|comparison_exception | generic|specific | literal|idiomatic | plain|elevated", "source_file": "Preposition.md", "source_md5": "0b9818b4e553767ae50c844f4bbf0de9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:32:25.366447Z"}

{"concept_id": "preposition", "error_id": "wrong_preposition", "description": "Chosen preposition doesn’t match pictured relation.", "fixit": "Swap to the hinge that matches meaning (space/time/means/etc.).", "example_fix": "‘on accident’→‘by accident’ (reg varies).", "source_file": "Preposition.md", "source_md5": "0b9818b4e553767ae50c844f4bbf0de9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:32:25.366447Z"}

{"concept_id": "preposition", "error_id": "stacking_noise", "description": "Over-stacked prepositions blur meaning.", "fixit": "Prune or split phrases; prefer one strong hinge.", "example_fix": "‘in on about the policy’ → choose one.", "source_file": "Preposition.md", "source_md5": "0b9818b4e553767ae50c844f4bbf0de9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:32:25.366447Z"}

{"concept_id": "preposition", "error_id": "case_error", "description": "Pronoun case wrong after preposition.", "fixit": "Use object case after prepositions.", "example_fix": "‘between you and me’ not ‘I’.", "source_file": "Preposition.md", "source_md5": "0b9818b4e553767ae50c844f4bbf0de9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:32:25.366447Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_prep_picture", "concept_id": "preposition", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "Replace vague/mismatched prepositions by drawing the mental picture first, then picking the hinge.", "expected_features": "Swaps clarify time/space/agency; tone fits.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate + justified", "Meets": "Mostly correct", "Developing": "Vague/incorrect"}, "variation_axes": "relation|specificity|idiomaticity|register", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Preposition.md", "source_md5": "0b9818b4e553767ae50c844f4bbf0de9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:32:25.366447Z"}
